name: Geet's Handy Links and Notes
body:
# Handy Links and Notes

## Docker

* Nice flow to get a scalable Spark+HDFS workbench using Docker.  Could work nicely with Swarm.  https://www.big-data-europe.eu/scalable-sparkhdfs-workbench-using-docker/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
